titleStmt.title: The Lord George Digbies apologie for himselfe, published the fourth of January, Anno Dom. 1642
Lord George Digbie's apologie for himselfe
titleStmt.author: Bristol, George Digby, Earl of, 1612-1677.

notesStmt.note: "A careless and poorly executed reprint of the Oxford edition ... published in London about Jan 9 [1642/43]"--cf. Madan.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
